# Install Docs

- [Check installed .NET versions on Windows, Linux, and macOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/how-to-detect-installed-versions.md): Learn how to list which versions of .NET are installed on your computer. This includes the .NET runtime and SDK.
- [Install .NET on Alpine](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-alpine.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Alpine.
- [Install .NET on Debian](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-debian.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Debian.
- [Install .NET on Fedora](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-fedora.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Fedora.
- [Install .NET on openSUSE Leap](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-opensuse.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on openSUSE Leap.
- [Troubleshoot .NET package mix ups on Linux](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-package-mixup.md): Learn about how to troubleshoot strange .NET package errors on Linux. These errors may occur when you run the dotnet command.
- [Install .NET on RHEL and CentOS Stream](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-rhel.md): Learn about which versions of .NET are supported, and how to install .NET on Red Hat Enterprise Linux and CentOS Stream.
- [Install .NET on Linux without using a package manager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-scripted-manual.md): Demonstrates how to install the .NET SDK and the .NET Runtime on Linux without a package manager. Use the install script or manually extract the binaries.
- [Install .NET on SUSE Enterprise Linux](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-sles.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on SUSE Enterprise Linux (SLES).
- [Install .NET Runtime on Linux with Snap](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-snap-runtime.md): Learn about how to install the .NET Runtime snap package. Canonical maintains and supports .NET-related snap packages.
- [Install .NET SDK on Linux with Snap](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-snap-sdk.md): Learn about how to install the .NET SDK snap package. Canonical maintains and supports .NET-related snap packages.
- [.NET and Ubuntu overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-ubuntu-decision.md): Learn about the ways you can install .NET on Ubuntu, either from the built-in package feed, the .NET backports repository, or the Microsoft repository.
- [Install .NET on Ubuntu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux-ubuntu-install.md): Demonstrates the various ways to install .NET SDK and .NET Runtime on Ubuntu. .NET is usually installed through APT.
- [Install .NET on Linux distributions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/linux.md): Learn about how .NET is available on Linux. .NET can be installed through a package manager, a snap package, or manually.
- [Working with macOS Catalina Notarization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/macos-notarization-issues.md): How to handle notarization and certificate problems with macOS when you install the .NET runtime, SDK, and apps built with .NET.
- [Install .NET on macOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/macos.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on macOS.
- [Remove the .NET runtime and SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/remove-runtime-sdk-versions.md): This article describes how to uninstall .NET on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Uninstall .NET manually, through a package manager, or with the .NET Uninstall Tool.
- [Install and manage SDK templates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/templates.md): Learn how to install .NET templates on Windows, Linux, and macOS. Templates are installed from NuGet, a NuGet package file, or a file system directory.
- [Upgrade to a new .NET version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/upgrade.md): Learn how to upgrade an app to a new .NET version. Upgrade .NET when the current version goes out of support or when you want to use new features of .NET. Control versions of SDK, analyzers, and packages for predictable builds.
- [Install .NET on Windows](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/install/windows.md): Learn about which versions of .NET SDK and .NET Runtime are supported, and how to install .NET on Windows.
